Literature.Title: The antibiotic activity of cationic linear amphipathic peptides: lessons from the action of leucine/lysine copolymers on bacteria of the class Mollicutes.
Literature.Author: Béven L, Castano S, Dufourcq J, Wieslander A, Wróblewski H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acholeplasma laidlawii A-EF22(MIC=100µM),Mycoplasma gallisepticum S6(no activity data),Mycoplasma mycoides ssp. mycoides SC KH3J(no activity data),Spiroplasma citri R8A2(no activity data),Spiroplasma floricola BNR 1(no activity data),Spiroplasma melliferum BC3(no activity data)
